text: Charles David Hood Jr. (April 24, 1954 â€“ March 15, 2019) was a Republican politician. He was a Judge on the Seventh Judicial Circuit of Florida. He was a member of the Florida House of Representatives representing the 25th District from 2012 to 2014. Hood Jr. was born near Leesville, Louisiana. Hood Jr. died on March 15, 2019 in Ormond Beach, Florida from brain cancer, aged 64. ==References== ==Other websites== *Florida House of Representatives - Dave Hood, Jr. *Judges of the Seventh Judicial Circuit - Judge C. title: Dave Hood Jr.
